name: sleeping
translation: O Allah, by Your name I live and die.

name: awakening
duah: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَحْيَانَا بَعْدَ مَا أَمَاتَنَا وَإِلَيْهِ النُّشُورُ
transliteration: Alhamdulillah hillazi, Ahyana Ba'dam Amatana, Wa Ilahin Nushur
translation: All praise be to Allah, who gave us life after killing us (sleep is a form of death) and to Him will we be raised and returned
